thread.section_title: Hotel de Varenne - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Pleasant and quiet stay
thread.title_full: Pleasant and quiet stay - Review of Hotel de Varenne, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: philbarney84
title: Pleasant and quiet stay
text:
This was our second time in Paris and we chose the Varenne because of its good reviews on this site.
Everything is true and we have to say that our stay was more than enjoyable.
Quiet, comfortable,friendly staff, superb location.. We confirm each previous review.
This is the right place to spend a delightful stay in Paris.
